TheMusician:MusicalPercussion.NAME: Musical Percussion
TheMusician:MusicalPercussion.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Percussion. NL Lose 1 WoodWind. NL Exhaust.

TheMusician:MusicalString.NAME: Musical String
TheMusician:MusicalString.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! String. NL Lose 1 Bass. NL Exhaust.

TheMusician:MusicalBass.NAME: Musical Bass
TheMusician:MusicalBass.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Bass. NL Lose 1 String. NL Exhaust.

TheMusician:MusicalWoodWind.NAME: Musical WoodWind
TheMusician:MusicalWoodWind.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! WoodWind. NL Lose 1 Percussion. NL Exhaust.

TheMusician:TheBand.NAME: The Band
TheMusician:TheBand.DESCRIPTION: Add 1 Musical Card to your hand.
